00031 /************************************************************************
00032  WCS Exception Code
00033 
00034  See OGC Web Services Common Standard [OGC 06-121r9] for details
00035  Table 27 — Standard exception codes and meanings
00036         OperationNotSupported
00037         MissingParameterValue
00038         InvalidParameterValue
00039         VersionNegotiationFailed
00040         InvalidUpdateSequence
00041         OptionNotSupported
00042         NoApplicableCode
00043 
00044  See OGC® WCS 2.0 Interface Standard - Core [09-110r3] for details
00045  Table 18 - Exception codes for GetCoverage operation
00046          NoSuchCoverage
00047          InvalidAxisLabel
00048          InvalidSubsetting
00049 
00050 *************************************************************************/

00052 #ifndef WCS_ERROR_H_
00053 #define WCS_ERROR_H_
00054 
00055 #include <cpl_error.h>
00056 #include <string>
00057 
00058 using namespace std;
00059 
00060 #define OGC_WCS_OperationNotSupported           300
00061 #define OGC_WCS_MissingParameterValue           301
00062 #define OGC_WCS_InvalidParameterValue           302
00063 #define OGC_WCS_VersionNegotiationFailed        303
00064 #define OGC_WCS_InvalidUpdateSequence           304
00065 #define OGC_WCS_OptionNotSupported                      305
00066 #define OGC_WCS_NoApplicableCode                        306
00067 
00068 #define OGC_WCS_NoSuchCoverage                          307
00069 #define OGC_WCS_InvalidAxisLabel                        308
00070 #define OGC_WCS_InvalidSubsetting                       309
00071

00077 int     WCST_GetSoapMsgTrns();
00078 void WCST_SetSoapMsgTrns(int);
